data.title: Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
data.text:
Michael Bell (born July 30, 1938) is an American actor, voice actor, director and animal-rights activist.[1] He is known for his youthful voice. He has acted in video games and animated series, including The Transformers, G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero, The Houndcats, Rugrats, The Smurfs, and Snorks.

In live-action, he appeared in Dallas and Star Trek.
